verses.name: Lamentations 3:43
verses.text: Thou hast covered with anger, and persecuted us: thou hast slain, thou hast not pitied.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:44
verses.text: Thou hast covered thyself with a cloud, that our prayer should not pass through.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:45
verses.text: Thou hast made us as the offscouring and refuse in the midst of the people.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:46
verses.text: All our enemies have opened their mouths against us.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:47
verses.text: Fear and a snare is come upon us, desolation and destruction.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:48
verses.text: Mine eye runneth down with rivers of water for the destruction of the daughter of my people.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:49
verses.text: Mine eye trickleth down, and ceaseth not, without any intermission,

verses.name: Lamentations 3:50
verses.text: Till the Lord look down, and behold from heaven.
